localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The Battle of Mars is a PVP NFT game where you can challenge each other and take your opponent's Martian away. 1. Mint a Martian (10,000 unique martians available) 2. Join a crypto faction 3. Challenge a friend and take their Martian away
nodes.title: The Battle of Mars - A player vs player NFT game
nodes.author: Mario MG

nodes.excerpt: Donâ€™t you hate it when your Monday blues end on Friday nights? Fret not! Play Quizzes and Pictionary with your team in real-time group calls and bond with your team virtually. No installation required! Fire up your browsers and get ready to have some fun ğŸ‰
nodes.title: Trivia Game Center - Add fun to your work with team games right in your browser
nodes.author: Abhash Kumar

nodes.excerpt: Unicorns To The Moon is an action-packed tabletop game that turns your dreams of being a hotshot venture capitalist (VC) into a reality! Your job as a VC? Invest in unicorn companies, and send them to the moon.
nodes.title: Unicorns to the Moon - Play like a VC with this action-packed tabletop game
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Take a free space flight to get a personalized report showing unique insights into your meetings from 2021. From total hours in meetings to number of people you met & other fun trends! Claim your bragging rights by sharing your meeting report!
nodes.title: 2021 Your Year In Meetings - Fly with Jeff Bezos into space to review your 2021
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Ditch the virtual happy hours and host a poker night instead with Clubs Poker's new product --> "For Companies" ğŸ’š Just send a link to your colleagues and start playing ğŸ’š Add your company logo to the table and card decks ğŸ’š Dedicated event host (optional)
nodes.title: Clubs Poker - For Companies - Make your next company event an online poker night
nodes.author: Taylor Crane

nodes.excerpt: ZELF launches banking in Discord to power the play-to-earn revolution, positioning ZELF as the first bank of the Metaverse. Get your ZELF MetaPass card in 30 seconds, works with Apple Pay and Google Pay.
nodes.title: MetaPass by ZELF - Banking in Discord for gamers, first bank of the Metaverse
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Create photorealistic avatars for engaging conversations. Have fun interacting with your Digital Human.
nodes.title: Botify AI - Create digital humans for engaging conversations
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: NFT Price Floor shows most used metrics by NFT art collectors like price floor, average price, listed ratio, etc., and show them altogether (kind of a coingecko-like for NFTs.
nodes.title: NFT Price Floor - NFT ranking dashboard, a hub for NFT prices and curated data
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Breshna empowers users to create their own educational, marketing and training video games with no-code & at lightning speed. Think Canva for video games ğŸ® With Breshna, everyone can be a game developer! P.S: Breshna means lightning âš¡ in the Pashto language
nodes.title: Breshna - Make no-code video games to engage ur audience
nodes.author: Mariam Nusrat - Founder of GRID

nodes.excerpt: Web app where you can check deep post-match statistics, compare teams pre-match stats and form. Full team stats across tournaments. Teams and players ranking.
nodes.title: E-Sports Stats - All e-sports stats in one place
nodes.author: Bogdan Nikolaevich

nodes.excerpt: This Week In Metaverse is a weekly newsletter delivering latest news from Metaverse world. We scan through important Metaverse developments and add all to a simple and fun to read 5mins email.
nodes.title: This Week In Metaverse - Best updates and news from Metaverse in a 5 minutes e-mail.
nodes.author: Petr Royce

nodes.excerpt: Improve your game, with the best collection of game tutorials on the web from some of the most popular names in the industry.
nodes.title: YOMI - The best collection of free game tutorials on the web
nodes.author: Glen Noble

nodes.excerpt: The success of Netflix's Squid Game made us question to what extent the Startup world, including its investors and companies, are trapped in one of the 7 Squid Games from the show. Find out for yourself which squid game your company is trapped in.
nodes.title: Is Your Startup Trapped in a Squid Game? - Find out how the Market makes your Startup play by its rules
nodes.author: Saksham Sharda

nodes.excerpt: vig is a web and mobile app that provides gamified decision intelligence for Stocks, Options, Crypto, and ETFs. Get real-time data and analytics, discover new investments, find trade opportunities, learn about the markets, and even play fantasy stock games.
nodes.title: vig - Your real-time trading edge for stocks, options and crypto
nodes.author: Johannes Frank

nodes.excerpt: Play games directly in iMessage and make new friends to play with. Gamebytes brings a fresh collection of games to iMessage along with a dedicated chat app to be the home for all your chat games.
nodes.title: Gamebytes - Games for iMessage
nodes.author: Jared Downing

nodes.excerpt: Internet is full of free learning resources. Our team has handpicked the best game development resources for anyone who's passionate about games. We have invested 100+ hours in building this starter kit so that aspiring game developers can save theirs'.
nodes.title: Game Development Starter Kit - One click access to 1000+ game development resources
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Create fashion lines; sell them as digital goods using our powerful in-app style creator. Link them to NFTs. Explore the latest fashion trends; post them to your feed using your 3D avatar. Forge a new identity, discover new friends. Become a fashion ICON!
nodes.title: ICON - The ultimate mobile fashion adventure and creation game.
nodes.author: jason

nodes.excerpt: Thursday is where remote teams do their socials. It is a place to hang out with your team and play games in small groups. No sign up required. Nothing to install. Free to use.
nodes.title: Thursday - Where remote teams do their socials, no sign up required
nodes.author: Nishith Shah

nodes.excerpt: evader is a minimal game about evading oncoming obstacles in a constricted area, written in Vanilla JavaScript. Hope you have fun!
nodes.title: Evader - A minimal game on evading obstacles in a constricted area
nodes.author: Sai Kishore Komanduri

nodes.excerpt: With in3D, anyone can create their realistic 3D avatar with just a phone camera within 30 seconds. Once scanned, users can animate their avatars, make funny videos in AR, try on cool digital looks and play as themselves in GTA V, Second Life, and VRChat.
nodes.title: in3D - Digitize yourself, try digital looks, and have fun in AR
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: *The Ultimate Companion App For Notion* â†’ Celebrate ANY Win You Can Track In Notion â†’ Engage In Party Quests And Slay Dragons With Your Friends â†’ Get Motivated By Friendly Competition With Our Community â†’ Create Custom Embeddable Components For Notion Pages
nodes.title: Make Work Fun - Gamify Notion workspaces and celebrate your personal wins
nodes.author: Conrad Lin
